Rating: Business Overview

Lesson
objectives

¢ Identify the main components in rating
¢ Describe primary rating terms
« Explain the rating implementation approach

| A look at the overall process of rating Gi

Kalani t 5 On my next project, I’m
working with PolicyCenter
Rating Management. Can
you give me an overview
of how rating works? Julia

Implementation
Architect

Rating Analyst

Let’s start by looking at
the overall process.

| PolicyCenter rating overview G

ae

* Rating is the process of determining the cost of a policy

Rating Engine

¢ Rating output results in information representing the prices for various portions of
the policies such as coverage costs, taxes or fees

| Components of PolicyCenter rating management fa

What are the main components in
PolicyCenter rating management?

Julia

The main components are Implementation
rate books, rate tables, rate Architect
routines and parameter
sets. I'll show you.

SS
|

| Rating components fa

Rating Engine roy

=
@-coe-

Rate tables Rate book Rate routines
and rate table
definitions
Parameter Set

Gi

| Rating process diagram CO)
a
} —-ii§—__-.

Quote Rating Engine selects a Rate Book. The Rating Engine calls a Rate Routine
for the Cost Item (for example, coverage)

E
Return them to the calling policy transaction (Quote) G

Constructs a corresponding
worksheet with the calculated results

Question

_— — What are some of the actions that take place in terms of rating after a
¢ quote is requested?

4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Gi

Answer fa

_— — What are some of the actions that take place in terms of rating after a
oo quote is requested?
“ Possible answers include:
1. Rating Engine selects a Rate Book
2. The Rating Engine calls a Rate Routine for the Cost Item (for example, coverage)

3. The PolicyCenter Rating Engine constructs the corresponding Worksheet with the
calculated results

4. The results are returned to the calling policy transaction (quote)

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

| Rating terminology fa

Julia
Implementation {

‘

Architect

~ over these in more detail?

That’s a lot of new terms.
Would you like me to go

Kalani °
Rating Analyst Ve

Yes, please.

| Rate tables and rate table definitions i

¢ Arate table contains static rates in a
table format consisting of one or
more rows

* Rate tables contain columns
representing parameters used to
lookup a value, known as a factor.

* Arate table definition describes the
parameters and factors for a
particular rate table

Question

_—- — Whatis a rate table?

¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

_—- — Whatis a rate table?

¢
7 Arate table contains static rates in a table format consisting of one or more rows.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Question

,- — Whatis a factor?

Ssesessee see s5455=>-

Answer

,- — Whatis a factor?

¢
: “ A factor is a value in a rate table that can be a rate factor, class, or tier, or as code for

use in further lookups.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Gi

Question

_- — Whatis a parameter set?
y ¢
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

_- — Whatis a parameter set?

¢
oe A parameter set enables users to define the usable information available within a rate

routine.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Gi

| Rate routines i

« Arate routine defines steps for
calculating a cost for coverage, taxes
and other policy costs

¢ Arate routine step can specify:
« Mathematical operations
* Logic conditions

« Variable assignments from a rate table
lookup

| Rate books i

¢ Arate book is a group of rate tables
and rate routines

* Rate books can be accessed from
the Administration tab > Rating >
Rate Books

| Rating engine and rate flow fa

¢ The base implementation of the
rating engine uses a hierarchy of
classes and flexible logic

* The term “rate flow” refers to the
logic in the rating engine that
calculates the premium

Rate Flow

Question

,—- — Whatis “rate flow’?

¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

,—- — Whatis “rate flow’?

¢
oe Rate flow is the logic in the rating engine plugin that calculates the premium.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

| Process for implementing rating

Rating Analyst © What is the process for
implementing rating?

While the rating manual
remains the same, you have
to adjust the content so that
it works in PolicyCenter.

Julia
Implementation We
Architect

!

| Move rating content to PolicyCenter Gi

Mainframe Policy Administration System

;) rating manual

The rating manual is the same, but the format is changed

| The actuary’s (or rating analyst's) role G

&

¢ During implementation, actuaries
provide rating-specific content to
configuration developers

¢ The format you have may not work

¢ Work with implementation experts to
transition“old” rating content format to
a PolicyCenter-ready format while
keeping the rating manual the same

Rating user stories: Example implementation stories [5

Set up Rate Table

Set up Rate Routines

Creation of a country-wide rate
book and a jurisdictional rate
book

As an actuary or rating

analyst, | want to be able to
define and populate the required
rate tables.

As an actuary or rating analyst, |
want to enter the rate routines
into the Rating Engine.

As an actuary or rating analyst, |
want to define rate books to
support policy line and
jurisdictional requirements so
that | can better manage rate
tables and rate routines.

The Rate Tables in
PolicyCenter represent the look
ups for Rate Factors

The Rate Routines in
PolicyCenter represent the
rating (algorithm) used to
calculate each premium or cost

Rate books relate rate tables
and rate routines together for
insurers to file and use for each
jurisdiction.

| Starting with this... G

Rating Algorithm

| Review: What is required? i
Rate Flow: Logic in the rating engine that performs the

premium calculation
Rate Tables: The rating content
in a lookup format

Rate Book: A group of rate tables and rate routines G

Rate Routines: Algorithms used to
calculate premium

| Rate flow implementation approach fa

¢ The rate flow defines the order of
execution

¢ Simple rate lines of business (LOB) may
not require much alteration from out-of-
the-box (OOTB) samples*

¢ Analternative approach to hard-coding
the rate routines is to define the rate
order in a table of its own which will call
the routines according to priority

Q

+ Examples exist for PARatingEngine.gs and
CPRatingEngine.gs in the base configuration
of PolicyCenter

* Hard-coding rate routines is NOT
recommended

Question

_- — Whatis the process that an actuary or rating analyst must follow in order
¢ to prepare usable rating content for the configuration developer?

4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Gi

Answer fa

_— — Whatis the process that an actuary or rating analyst must follow in order
oo to prepare usable rating content for the configuration developer?
¢
Each rating implementation starts from a different place. For example, a rating analyst
may have a spreadsheet with existing rating data or it may be contained in the current
system in another format. Actuaries and rating specialists must create content that is
PolicyCenter ready.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Lesson
objectives ¢ Identify the main components in rating
review * Describe primary rating terms

« Explain the rating implementation approach
